abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32576326, pmid32591762, pmid32591754, pmid32579064, pmid32573919, pmid32592145, pmid32593196, pmid32592519, pmid32565591, pmid32590819, pmid32592118, pmid32591488, pmid32592048, pmid32592507, pmid32599614, pmid32601655, pmid32589459, pmid32591888, pmid32579061, pmid32592501, pmid32592021
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.02
